ygData.subject: Surefire technique
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail All, I ve seen alot of discussion lately about how to stop a spell once you ve started casting.  There is a sure-fire method that NEVER (at least for me
ygData.messageBody:
Hail All,

I've seen alot of discussion lately about how to stop a spell once
you've started casting. There is a sure-fire method that NEVER (at least
for me it hasn't, and I've been using it for the last 10 levels) fails that
a friend of mine discovered. Takes a little while to get used to it (muscle
memory, and all that) AND you don't have to move a step. Not moving around
comes in handy when your fighting next to lava and/or near a place where
moving a little bit forward could aggro more mobs. What's the secret you
ask? DUCK!!!! Works every time without fail. Seems "You must be standing
to cast a spell". Try it, it works. Yes, yes, I know, I rule.

Maureen LightningStorm, 31 Wiz
Laszarus, 35 Ench
Povar
